title: League of Legends bug
body:
Hi, 

Many weeks ago, my LOL launcher doesn't work. Please Help Me !!!

replies.body: This black screen is normally a network problem failing to connect to our server.  For your specific issue, you can use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I tried the troubleshooting connection video but it doesn't work.
